global.title: U-Dig It AI Partnership Playbook
global.description: Strategies for building co-marketing, affiliate, and SaaS integration partnerships.
global.guardrails: Partnerships must be transparent, ethical, and mutually beneficial.

default.headline: 💰 Become a U-Dig It AI Affiliate
body: Earn recurring commissions by promoting U-Dig It AI products.

webinars.headline: 🎤 Co-Host an AI Webinar
webinars.body: Collaborate with industry partners to deliver value-packed webinars, driving leads for both sides.

case_studies.headline: 📑 Joint Case Studies
case_studies.body: Publish co-branded case studies showing how your tools + U-Dig It AI deliver results together.

guest_posts.headline: ✍️ Guest Posting Opportunities
guest_posts.body: Invite partners to publish on your blog, exchange backlinks, and share audiences.

api_hooks.headline: ⚡ Automate with Zapier
api_hooks.body: Connect U-Dig It AI to 5000+ apps using Zapier integrations.

api_hooks.headline: 📈 Sync With HubSpot
api_hooks.body: Auto-sync leads, contacts, and usage data with HubSpot CRM.

api_hooks.headline: 💬 Slack Notifications
api_hooks.body: Send AI updates and workflows directly into Slack channels.

integration.tracking: All partner campaigns must include UTM tags for attribution.
integration.payouts: Affiliate payouts handled via Stripe Connect monthly.
integration.legal: Partnership agreements must include co-branding, data-sharing, and refund liability clauses.
